Liga
Levante - Bar√ßa: the anger of Suarez against Griezmann!
During Bar√ßa's 3-1 defeat of Levante, Luis Suarez showed his anger towards the tricolor striker Griezmann choosing the shot instead of the pass.
02 Nov 2019, 19:20 by Charlie Creteur



Is Antoine Griezmann ignored by his partners? A question that feeds the press again for several days following some actions as in the victory against Valladolid (5-1) where the former striker Atl√©tico Madrid would give the impression of being forgotten by his partners. During the 12th day's move against Levante (3-1), another action makes talk in Spain. During the match, Antoine Griezmann tried to score from a closed angle against the other Valencia club. What did not please his teammate Luis Suarez claiming a pass and showing his anger on the ground. One thing is certain, the relationship between Griezmann and its new partners continues to make people talk!
